title: They Both Die at the End
author: Adam Silvera
review: Even though the title has the ending in it, it still manages to be a=n emotional journey all the way through. It deals with themes of death in a way that is both sensitive and imaginative.

title: I'll Give You the Sun
author: Jandy Nelson
review: This book mixes art, LGBTQ+ love, struggles of losing a family member and the nuances of being a teenager in a way that is captivating. The story is told by 2 twins at different parts of their lives. Although the perspectives are 2 years apart, the story is cohesive and immersive.
